articles.title: SAFF U-16 Championship: India kickstart campaign with win over Bangladesh - Khel Now
articles.description: India got the better of Bangladesh in their SAFF U-16 Championship 2023 opener on 2 September.
articles.content:
The India U-16 Mens Team secured a hard-fought 1-0 win over Bangladesh to open their SAFF U-16 Championship campaign on Saturday, August 2, 2023, at the Changlimithang Stadium in Thimphu, Bhutan.
